heroParagraphOne: I completed my education at Ankara Y覺ld覺r覺m Beyaz覺t University's Faculty of Engineering. After my education, I turned to the world of software development and specialized in front-end development. Focusing on modern JavaScript frameworks such as React.js, Vue.js, Angular.js, Next.js, and Nuxt.js, I have been involved in various large-scale projects.
heroParagraphTwo: I started my professional career as a front-end developer at Etstur, and gained experience by working at large companies like Huawei and Softtech. I am currently working as a front-end developer at Payten, focusing on payment systems.
heroParagraphThree: Throughout my career, I have contributed to redesigning user interfaces, optimizing performance, and adding new features, as well as working on advanced software solutions such as user authentication, payment systems, and form management.
